description:
"Zero to Oneness" is based on the self entitled e-book. It is a balanced manifestation/ prosperity model for business and relationships

A balanced cycle that allows you to access inner guidance and awareness to utilize into outward action. It moves you through INtuition, INner desire, INner guidance, INviting, INtention, thus bringing out the INtrepreneur in you.

1- Access desire

list your desired feelings for the situation such as - healthy, abundant, grounded, fun, warm-hearted

2-Be clear

acknowledge you fear, doubt or anger- all of which are focused on the past or future-- not the present now

3- Flip it

as if in doubt, make statements about what you are confident about.

4- Then work through the L.I.L.I.A.A. process (love, intention, listen, intuition, asking and action)

5- set clear, loving intentions

6- listen to your intuition/gut

7- put into action, take active steps to attract more of what you desire

8- ask for... help, right timing, more resources, etc.

9- repeat

It balances feminine creative principle with masculine action.

Not working? Start again and repeat the cycle, getting more clear, re-adjusting and fine tuning your desire and intent.
title: Zero to Oneness- 8 Simple Steps to Happiness and Abundance
